name: Apocalypse Wow
author: Sam
description: Now you've learned to love, you must learn to kill. Use your advanced weapons training to take down the enemy ship, before he destroys your small village!
briefing:
We are under attack!
Fetch your guns and/or grenades and take down that orbiting bombarder!

(Play some Wagner on another tab, I couldn't get the rights to use the song myself.)
